verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me again, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

What mean ye, that ye \w use|strong="H4911"\w* this \w proverb|strong="H4912"\w* concerning the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* sour \w grapes|strong="H1155"\w*, and the \w children’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* are set on \w edge|strong="H6949"\w*?

\add As\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, ye shall not have \add occasion\add* any more to \w use|strong="H4911"\w* this \w proverb|strong="H4912"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Behold, all \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* are mine; as the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of the \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, so also the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* is mine: the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* that \w sinneth|strong="H2398"\w*, it shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

¶ But if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* be \w just|strong="H6662"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* that which is \w lawful|strong="H4941"\w* and \w right|strong="H6666"\w*,\f + \fr 18.5 \ft that…: Heb. judgment and justice\f*

\add And\add* hath not \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, neither hath lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* to the \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, neither hath \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* his \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, neither hath come \w near|strong="H7126"\w* to a \w menstruous|strong="H5079"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*,

And hath not \w oppressed|strong="H3238"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w*, \add but\add* hath \w restored|strong="H7725"\w* to the \w debtor|strong="H2326"\w* his \w pledge|strong="H2258"\w*, hath \w spoiled|strong="H1497"\w* none by \w violence|strong="H1500"\w*, hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* his \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* to the \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w*, and hath \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* the \w naked|strong="H5903"\w* with a \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*;

He \add that\add* hath not given \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* upon \w usury|strong="H5392"\w*, neither hath \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* any \w increase|strong="H8636"\w*, \add that\add* hath \w withdrawn|strong="H7725"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* from \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*, hath \w executed|strong="H6213"\w* \w true|strong="H0571"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* between \w man|strong="H0376"\w* and \w man|strong="H0376"\w*,

Hath \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* in my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, and hath \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, to \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* \w truly|strong="H0571"\w*; he \add is\add* \w just|strong="H6662"\w*, he shall \w surely|strong="H2421"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

¶ If he \w beget|strong="H3205"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \add that is\add* a \w robber|strong="H6530"\w*, a \w shedder|strong="H8210"\w* of \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and \add that\add* \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* the \w like|strong="H0251"\w* to \add any\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of these \add things\add*,\f + \fr 18.10 \ft robber: or, breaker up of an house\f*\f + \fr 18.10 \ft that doeth…: or, that doeth to his brother besides any of these\f*

And that \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* not any of those \add duties\add*, but even hath \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* his \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*,

Hath \w oppressed|strong="H3238"\w* the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* and \w needy|strong="H0034"\w*, hath \w spoiled|strong="H1497"\w* by \w violence|strong="H1500"\w*, hath not \w restored|strong="H7725"\w* the \w pledge|strong="H2258"\w*, and hath lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* to the \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*, hath \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w*,

Hath given \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* upon \w usury|strong="H5392"\w*, and hath \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w increase|strong="H8636"\w*: shall he then \w live|strong="H2425"\w*? he shall not \w live|strong="H2421"\w*: he hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* all these \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*; he shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*; his \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* shall be upon him.\f + \fr 18.13 \ft blood: Heb. bloods\f*

¶ Now, lo, \add if\add* he \w beget|strong="H3205"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, that \w seeth|strong="H7200"\w* all his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* which he hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, and \w considereth|strong="H7200"\w*, and \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* not such \w like|strong="H2004"\w*,

\add That\add* hath not \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, neither hath lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* to the \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, hath not \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* his \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*,

Neither hath \w oppressed|strong="H3238"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w*, hath not \w withholden|strong="H2254"\w* the \w pledge|strong="H2258"\w*, neither hath \w spoiled|strong="H1497"\w* by \w violence|strong="H1500"\w*, \add but\add* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* his \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* to the \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w*, and hath \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* the \w naked|strong="H5903"\w* with a \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*,\f + \fr 18.16 \ft hath not…: Heb. hath not pledged the pledge, or, taken to pledge\f*

\add That\add* hath taken \w off|strong="H7725"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* from the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*, \add that\add* hath not \w received|strong="H3947"\w* \w usury|strong="H5392"\w* nor \w increase|strong="H8636"\w*, hath \w executed|strong="H6213"\w* my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, hath \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* in my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*; he shall not \w die|strong="H4191"\w* for the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, he shall \w surely|strong="H2421"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.

\add As for\add* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, because he \w cruelly|strong="H6233"\w* \w oppressed|strong="H6231"\w*, \w spoiled|strong="H1497"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* by \w violence|strong="H1499"\w*, and \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that\add* which \add is\add* not \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, lo, even he shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* in his \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

¶ Yet \w say|strong="H0559"\w* ye, Why? doth not the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of the \w father|strong="H0001"\w*? When the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* that which is \w lawful|strong="H4941"\w* and \w right|strong="H6666"\w*, \add and\add* hath \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* all my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, and hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* them, he shall \w surely|strong="H2421"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.

The \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* that \w sinneth|strong="H2398"\w*, it shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w*. The \w son|strong="H1121"\w* shall not \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of the \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, neither shall the \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of the \w son|strong="H1121"\w*: the \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* shall be upon him, and the \w wickedness|strong="H7564"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall be upon him.

But if the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* will \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* from all his \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* that he hath \w committed|strong="H6213"\w*, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* all my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* that which is \w lawful|strong="H4941"\w* and \w right|strong="H6666"\w*, he shall \w surely|strong="H2421"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, he shall not \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

All his \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* that he hath \w committed|strong="H6213"\w*, they shall not be \w mentioned|strong="H2142"\w* unto him: in his \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* that he hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* he shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w*.

Have I any \w pleasure|strong="H2654"\w* at \w all|strong="H2654"\w* that the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* should \w die|strong="H4194"\w*? \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*: \add and\add* not that he should \w return|strong="H7725"\w* from his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and \w live|strong="H2421"\w*?

¶ But when the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* turneth \w away|strong="H7725"\w* from his \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, and \w committeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*, \add and\add* \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* according to all the \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* that the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add man\add* \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w*, shall he \w live|strong="H2425"\w*? All his \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* that he hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* shall not be \w mentioned|strong="H2142"\w*: in his \w trespass|strong="H4603"\w* that he hath \w trespassed|strong="H4604"\w*, and in his \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* that he hath \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, in them shall he \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

¶ Yet ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* is not \w equal|strong="H8505"\w*. \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* now, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; Is not my \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w equal|strong="H8505"\w*? are not your \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w unequal|strong="H8505"\w*?

When a \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \add man\add* turneth \w away|strong="H7725"\w* from his \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, and \w committeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w*, and \w dieth|strong="H4191"\w* in them; for his \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* that he hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* shall he \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

Again, when the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add man\add* turneth \w away|strong="H7725"\w* from his \w wickedness|strong="H7564"\w* that he hath \w committed|strong="H6213"\w*, and \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* that which is \w lawful|strong="H4941"\w* and \w right|strong="H6666"\w*, he shall \w save|strong="H2421"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*.

Because he \w considereth|strong="H7200"\w*, and turneth \w away|strong="H7725"\w* from all his \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* that he hath \w committed|strong="H6213"\w*, he shall \w surely|strong="H2421"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, he shall not \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

Yet \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, The \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* is not \w equal|strong="H8505"\w*. O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, are not my \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w equal|strong="H8505"\w*? are not your \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w unequal|strong="H8505"\w*?

Therefore I will \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* you, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* according to his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*. \w Repent|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \add yourselves\add* from all your \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w*; so \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* shall not be your \w ruin|strong="H4383"\w*.\f + \fr 18.30 \ft yourselves: or, others\f*

¶ Cast \w away|strong="H7993"\w* from you all your \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w*, whereby ye have \w transgressed|strong="H6586"\w*; and \w make|strong="H6213"\w* you a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* and a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*: for why will ye \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

For I have no \w pleasure|strong="H2654"\w* in the \w death|strong="H4194"\w* of him that \w dieth|strong="H4191"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*: wherefore \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \add yourselves\add*, and \w live|strong="H2421"\w* ye.\f + \fr 18.32 \ft yourselves: or, others\f*
